Text:
BOZX, usually i'm not the stupid one who writes, "is this a dvdrip or what dudes?"

but i didn't see 'dvdrip' anywhere in the description, so for the first time, *braces himself*,

Um, is this release a dvdrip?

ohh shiit it isn't MEANT to be a dvdrip! i JUST realized its a blu ray - the size, picture, and well, the title were a bit of a dead giveway.

Shit. 

*just re-reads the previous comment and breaks out in cold shivers*

Thanks dude, great rip.
